Left-handed pitcher Chris Sale, a veteran with 241 starts in his career, told reporters Tuesday at Fenway Park that he'd be willing to return from injury as a reliever.

articles.title: 4-star OL Clay Wedin commits to Michigan State - MLive.com
articles.description: The Spartans now have 11 players committed for their 2023 class that ranks eighth in the nation.
articles.content:
Make that a pair of four-star additions in the same day for Michigan State footballs next recruiting class.
